New Records: Quinton de Kock scored 114 and Rassie van der Dussen scored 133, both hitting centuries in the match
Keshav Maharaj took 4 wickets for 46 runs
Key Match Events: South Africa posted a total of 4-357 after a partnership of 200 runs between de Kock and van der Dussen
New Zealand were dismissed for 167 in 35.3 overs after a collapse
Marco Jansen took 3 wickets for 31 runs and Tim Southee took 2 wickets for 77 runs
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa captain Temba Bavuma praised the team's performance after the match
New Zealand captain Tom Latham won the toss and decided to bowl first
Post-Match Reflections: South Africa's victory helped them move to the top of the standings
New Zealand's performance was criticized by their captain Tom Latham who mentioned their inability to build partnerships
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant as it came after the Rugby World Cup final between the same nations
The Proteas avoided facing India in the semi-finals
